review: This connection isn't sound.  If my calculations are correct, it should be sometime around 2007 for whomever is reading this.  DO NOT USE THESE CABLES.  Something... happens with them.  Something came through, something from somewhere else.  We were overrun in days, not many of us are left.  WE LIVE UNDERGROUND!  ONLY YOU CAN STOP IT NOW.  SAVE US.  DO NOT USE THESE CABLES.I don't have much time.  This connection isn't sound.  If my calculations are correct, it should be--
productTitle: Denon AKDL1 Dedicated Link Cable (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
